1608360.name: Maroon
1608360.description:
Maroon is an interactive virtual STEM laboratory and experimentation environment that allows you to explore various experiments and phenomena in an immersive and engaging way.

The main laboratory room consists of different experiment stations and acts as a three-dimensional menu. Choose any experiment to start. Currently, Maroon supports experiments from the fields of electromagnetism, electrostatics, oscillation, waves, analytical chemistry, and algorithms.

Experiments

Among others, you can try out the following experiments from the fields of physics, chemistry, and computer science:

  • Coulomb's Law

  • Falling Coil (Electromagnetism)

  • Faraday's Law

  • Huygen's Principle

  • Point Wave

  • Pendulum

  • Van de Graaff Balloon

  • Van de Graaff Generator

  • Optics

  • 3D Motion

  • Cathode Ray Tube

  • Viscosimeter

  • Planetary System

  • Titration

  • Catalyst

  • Sorting Algorithms

  • State Machines

  • Pathfinding Algorithms

  • Minimum Spanning Tree

  • Perlin Noise

Virtual Reality

Maroon is also available for VR. Choose an experiment from the vending machine and you are ready to start exploring! Currently, six of the experiments are supported in Virtual Reality.
